detectors.description: Contract qnml (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#14-75) is not in CapWords

qnml.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#14-75) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 7500000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#16)
detectors.markdown:
[qnml.slitherConstructorVariables()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#L14-L75) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [initialSupply = 7500000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#L16)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#4)
	- qnml.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#22-24)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#5)
	- qnml.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#28-30)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- qnml.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#32-34)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#6)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#8)
	- qnml.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#59-63)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- qnml.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#36-45)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/qnml.sol#9)
